documents.document: yeah, love you too Neath Port Talbot
I expected better from you, North Lincolnshire
West Devon, you have failed me for the last time
I expected better from you, Central Bedfordshire
we should do this more often, Hertsmere *eyeroll*
oh Wealden, we used to be so close
round of applause, Tonbridge and Malling </sarcasm >
Great Yarmouth? Nope, doesn't ring a bell
thought you were better than this, Surrey Heath
there's always someone has to ruin it, and this time it was Eastbourne
I'm not angry with you, Bedford... I'm just disappointed
You just sit there, Birmingham, and think about what you've done.
thought you were better than this, Broxtowe
thought you were better than this, Tameside
okay, great talking to you Isle of Wight 👏 👏 👏
You just sit there, Walsall, and think about what you've done.
we should do this more often, Teignbridge
okay, great talking to you Thanet #NoReally
let's hear it for Taunton Deane
I trusted you, Hambleton, and this is how you repay me?
you were a big help, Hambleton
You just sit there, Newport, and think about what you've done.
it's been fun, Sutton, but I think we're done here
let's hear it for Barking and Dagenham #sarcasm
really glad you could make it, Harborough #sternface
I expected better from you, Lincoln
Repent at leisure, East Riding of Yorkshire, repent at leisure.
Spare me your excuses, North Lincolnshire.
so, uh, see you around Sheffield
pat on the back, North Tyneside #NoReally
I trusted you, Gloucester, and this is how you repay me?
really glad you could make it, Sheffield *slow handclap*
really glad you could make it, Chorley
I trusted you, Broxtowe, and this is how you repay me?
thought you were better than this, Halton
let's hear it for West Lancashire 😛
you brought this on yourself, Northampton
oh Rochford, we used to be so close
you brought this on yourself, Ryedale
I expected better from you, Merthyr Tydfil
thanks for your contribution, North Devon *eyeroll*
have fun explaining this to your grandchildren, Wellingborough
maybe it was funny at the time, Shepway
there's always someone has to ruin it, and this time it was Rotherham
pat on the back, North Antrim 🖕
thanks for your contribution, South Antrim
